mapper.sql: u.id,u.uuid,u.status,u.createTime,u.updateTime, u.companyId,u.parentId,u.parentClass,u.account,u.password,u.salt,u.name,u.nickName,u.mobile,u.idCard,u.sex,u.birthday,u.remark,u.lastLoginTime, u.email,u.sort,u.type,u.ico,u.code,u.govCode,u.jobPosition,u.job,u.sms,u.zwuid,u.dduid,u.ddStatus,u.dyType,u.rdDate,u.dorg, d.name as orgName,d.fullName as orgFullName,c.name as companyName
mapper.select:
select
from um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id where u.companyId = #{companyId}

select
from um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id where u.parentId = #{departmentId} AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment'

select
from um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id where u.id=#{id}

SELECT
FROM um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id WHERE u.id = #{id} and u.uuid=#{uuid} and u.status <> 9

SELECT u.id,u.uuid,u.status,u.createTime,u.updateTime, u.companyId,u.parentId,u.parentClass,u.account,u.password,u.salt,u.name,u.nickName,u.mobile,u.idCard,u.sex,u.birthday,u.remark,u.lastLoginTime, u.email,u.sort,u.type,u.ico,u.code,u.govCode,u.jobPosition,u.job,u.sms,u.zwuid,u.dduid,c.name as orgName FROM
um_yw_user u left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id
um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department c on u.parentId=c.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment'
WHERE u.id = #{id} and u.uuid=#{uuid} and u.status <> 9

select
from um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id where u.govCode=#{govCode}

SELECT
FROM um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id WHERE u.account = #{account} and u.status <> 9

SELECT
FROM um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id WHERE u.mobile = #{mobile} and u.status <> 9

SELECT
FROM um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id WHERE u.mobile = #{mobile} and u.status <> 9 and u.ddStatus = 1

SELECT
FROM um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id WHERE u.zwuid = #{zwuid} and u.status <> 9

SELECT
FROM um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id WHERE u.dduid = #{dduid} and u.status <> 9

SELECT u.id,u.uuid,u.status,u.createTime,u.updateTime,u.parentId,u.parentClass,u.account,u.salt, u.name,u.nickName,u.mobile,u.idCard,u.sex,u.birthday,u.remark,u.lastLoginTime, u.email,u.sort,u.type,u.ico,u.code,u.govCode FROM um_yw_user u join um_yw_rel_org_leader rel on u.id=rel.userId WHERE u.status <> 9 AND rel.orgId=#{orgId}

SELECT u.id,u.uuid,u.status,u.createTime,u.updateTime,u.parentId,u.parentClass,u.account,u.salt, u.name,u.nickName,u.mobile,u.idCard,u.sex,u.birthday,u.remark,u.lastLoginTime, u.email,u.sort,u.type,u.ico,u.code,u.govCode FROM um_yw_user u join sys_zf_perm_grid g on u.id=g.userId WHERE u.status <> 9 AND g.gridId=#{gridId}
mapper.delete:
delete from um_yw_rel_role_user where userId=#{userId} and companyId=#{companyId} and roleId in
#{roleId}
delete from um_yw_rel_role_user where userId=#{userId} and companyId=#{companyId}
mapper.update: update um_yw_user set ico=#{ico},updateTime=now() where id=#{user.id} and uuid=#{user.uuid}
update um_yw_user set status=#{status},updateTime=now() where id=#{id} and uuid=#{uuid}
update um_yw_user set status=#{status},updateTime=now() where companyId=#{companyId}
update um_yw_user set status=#{status},updateTime=now() where parentId=#{departmentId} AND parentClass='YwDepartment'
update um_yw_user set zwuid=#{zwuid},updateTime=now() where id=#{umUserId}
mapper.delete: update um_yw_user set status=9,updateTime=now() where id=#{id} and uuid=#{uuid} and status <> 9

update um_yw_user set status=9,updateTime=now() where status <> 9 and id in
#{id}
mapper.update: update um_yw_user set lastLoginTime=now() where id=#{id}
update um_yw_user set code=#{code},updateTime=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(m.govCode) FROM um_app_menu m join um_yw_perm_menu pm on m.id=pm.menuId join um_yw_rel_role_user ru on ru.roleId=pm.roleId WHERE m.status=0 AND pm.appId=#{appId} AND ru.userId=#{userId} AND ru.companyId=#{companyId}
SELECT p.orgId FROM um_yw_perm_org p JOIN um_yw_rel_role_user r ON p.roleId=r.roleId WHERE r.userId=#{userId} AND p.appId=#{appId} AND r.companyId=#{companyId}
SELECT p.areaId FROM um_yw_perm_area p JOIN um_yw_rel_role_user r ON p.roleId=r.roleId WHERE r.userId=#{userId} AND p.appId=#{appId} AND r.companyId=#{companyId}

select
from um_yw_user u left join um_yw_department d on u.parentId=d.id AND u.parentClass='YwDepartment' left join um_yw_company c on u.companyId=c.id where u.status <> 9 and u.status <> 8 and u.type=9 and c.id=#{company.id} and c.uuid=#{company.uuid}
